content.html: My local dry cleaner was struggling to pay the bills. He was losing $10,000/mo. I told him to "use AI to transform his business" He took my advice. Bought a $20/mo subscription for ChatGPT. His business is totally transformed. He now loses $10,020/mo.
content.value:
My local dry cleaner was struggling to pay the bills.

He was losing $10,000/mo.

I told him to "use AI to transform his business"

He took my advice.

Bought a $20/mo subscription for ChatGPT.

His business is totally transformed.

He now loses $10,020/mo.
